price: (10) And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wasawāon ʿalayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum lā yu'minūna
